version_description:
- Reduced difficulty
- 2 new abilities to unlock: magnet and stun
- Slot system for active abilities
- Star doubler IAP added (also removes ad interstitials)
- 400 and 800 stars IAP added
- Improved UI
- Instructions added in the tutorial
- Important bug fixes

- New ability
- Enhanced fish/creature AI
- Food chain behavior added for the upcoming Aquarium update
- Chests now give 3 to 10 stars.
- iCloud support (saving abilities and third ability slot)
- Game Center auto connects at start
- Everyplay SDK updated
- Posted replays will now display the cause of your death
- New start places
- Sharing UI improved
- Optimizations and minor bugs fixed
Bug fixes.

- Hideouts (giant anemones)
- New creatures
- Difficulty balance
- Various gameplay fixes

- Scary new creatures!
- New discovery system and discovery window
- New biome (vacuum)
- Optimizations

- Scary new creatures!
- New discovery system and discovery window
- New biome (vacuum)
- Optimizations
- Bug fixes

- New wildlife
- New and improved tutorial
- Talking tikis

- New wildlife
- New and improved tutorial
- Talking tikis
- Gameplay tweaks
- Bug fixes
- Everyplay updated (annoying Everyplay startup window fixed)

- New creatures
- New preys
- Missing discovery log creatures added
- Reduced price for the stun and lightboost abilities
- Gameplay tweaks
- Tutorial fully translated
- Clouds around mushrooms no longer poison you
Optimizations
Restart bug fixed

- New unlockable creatures
- Extended discovery menu
- Anemones and plants are now discoverable
- Puzzles and magic stones
- Discoveries are now also saved to iCloud if it is enabled

- New unlockable creatures
- Extended discovery menu
- Anemones and plants are now discoverable
- Puzzles and magic stones
- Discoveries are now also saved to iCloud if it is enabled
- Bug fixes and game balance

- New playable jellyfishes
- New creature
- Game engine update
- Faster and more efficient world generation
- Bug fixes
- iOS 7 no longer supported

- Fix for the texture glitch visible on some devices
- Jellyfish unlock notification fixed
- Effect of the resistance characteristic increased on all jellyfish
- Faster world generation
- iOS7 support is back

- Fixes the game crashing at start on iPhones
- Fixes the texture glitch on iPhones

- New shark and new plants
- Bug fixes

- 2 new abilities
- New parasitic organism

- Small bug fixes
- Third party SDK updates

- iPhone X support
- Game engine update
- New shaders and light system
- Incremental achievements fixed
- Gameplay tweaks
- Third party SDK updates
- Everyplay removed (service is closing)
- Minor bug fixes
- Kutukuura discovery fixed
